questions_and_answers.question: What is the focus of the B.Tech in Electronics and Communications Engineering (Advanced Communication Technology) program?
questions_and_answers.answer:
The focus of the ECE (ACT) program is on Communication Networks, Embedded Systems, Digital Signal Processing, 5G, WiFi 6, IoT, Network Security, Information Technology and Advanced Communication Technologies.
For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-Communication.php
